remarks: Equality deduction for restricted existential quantifier.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Mar-2017.)
statement:
raleqbid.0 $e |- F/ x ph $.
raleqbid.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
raleqbid.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
raleqbid.3 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
raleqbid.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
rexeqbid $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. A ps <-> E. x e. B ch ) ) $.
